mapper.insert: insert into answer values ( surveyseq.nextval, #{id}, #{ansGender}, #{ans1}, #{ans2}, #{prodname}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from( select 1, a.* from product a where prodgender = #{ansGender} and prodans1 like '%${ans1}%' and prodans2 like '%${ans2}%' order by DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM) where rownum = 1
select * from( select * from product where prodgender = #{ansGender} and prodans1 like '%${ans1}%' order by DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM) where rownum = 1
select * from product where prodgender = ${ansGender} and name like '%${prodname}%'
select * from ( select rownum rnum, a.* from ( select * from answer where id = #{id} order by ser desc) a) where rnum between 1 and 4
select ans1, count(*) doughnut from answer where ansGender = #{ansGender} group by ans1 order by 1
